title: Digitalisation (pursuant to the Ministers and Secretaries Acts 1924 to 2020)
heading: 3. The Principal Regulations are hereby amended by:
text_raw:
3. The Principal Regulations are hereby amended by: 

(a) The substitution of the following Regulation for Regulation (1): 

“1. Where a member incurs expenses connected with improvements to their 
personal security to meet a credible and serious threat to their personal physical 
security arising from their role as an elected member of a local authority, the 
member’s local authority shall pay to the member a sum not exceeding €10,000, 
in settlement of a claim made under the allowance in respect of security 
measures, following receipt of a claim for these expenses.”; 

(b) 

the substitution of the following Regulation for Regulation 2: 

“2. A member may make a number of claims for payment of a sum, the total not 
exceeding €10,000, under this Regulation to the local authority of which he or 
she is a member in such form and containing such particulars as set out in 
directions the Minister may give under Regulation 4.”; 

(c) 

the insertion after Regulation 2 of the following Regulation: 

“2A. Where a member has previously made a claim under this allowance, and 
where they have met the balance of their expenditure up to a maximum value of 
€7,500, the member may apply to the local authority to be reimbursed for this 
amount.”; and, 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 8th July, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [297] 3 

(d) 

the insertion after Regulation 2A the following Regulation: 

“2B. Where an individual, who was previously an elected member of a local 
authority, made a claim under this allowance, and where they met the balance of 
their expenditure up to a maximum value of €2,500, the former member may 
apply to the local authority to be reimbursed for this amount.” 

The Minister for Public Expenditure, Infrastructure, Public Service Reform and 
Digitalisation consents to the making of the foregoing Regulations. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

1 July, 2025. 

JACK CHAMBERS, 

Minister for Public Expenditure, Department of Public 
Expenditure, Infrastructure, Public Service Reform and 
Digitalisation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

3 July, 2025. 

JAMES BROWNE, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage.
